lines.text: I'm afraid I will have to charge you rather a lot. My horses are all I own in the world, you know.
Money is no object to me, ma'am.
[Jos is taken aback, but promptly reaches for his pocketbook.]
Revenge may be wicked. But it's natural.
You don't mind the smell of my cigar, I hope?
No, I love it. I wonder if I might...
What, me? No! Never, damn it! ...Ah, what?
I am innocent. Before God, Rawdon, I AM innocent! Tell him I'm innocent!
